description: League One high-fliers Wycombe Wanderers sign Chesterfield winger James Berry for an undisclosed fee.
title: James Berry: Wycombe Wanderers sign Chesterfield winger
title_page: James Berry: Wycombe Wanderers sign Chesterfield winger - BBC Sport
maintext:
League One high-fliers Wycombe Wanderers have signed Chesterfield winger James Berry for an undisclosed fee.
Berry, 24, joined the Spireites from Macclesfield Town in August 2023 and helped them win the National League title last season.
He has scored 10 goals in 28 appearances this season for the League Two side.
Berry joins a Wycombe side sitting second in League One but without a head coach following Matt Bloomfield's departure to Championship side Luton Town.
